votes-desc: Adds links for voting users for edits, comments, etc.
votes-error-undefined: Vote action failed (error code: $1). Please try again.
votes-error-ratelimited: {{GENDER:$1|You}}'ve exceeded your rate limit. Please wait some time and try again.
echo-pref-tooltip-edit-vote: Notify me when someone voted me for an edit I made.
notification-bundle-header-rev-thank: {{PLURAL:$1|One person|$1 people|100=99+ people}} voted {{GENDER:$3|you}} for your edit on $2.
notification-bundle-header-log-thank: {{PLURAL:$1|One person|$1 people|100=99+ people}} voted {{GENDER:$3|you}} for your action relating to $2.
log-description-votes: Below is a list of users voted by other users.
thanks-error-no-id-specified: You must specify a revision or log ID to give vote.
thanks-confirmation-special-log: Do you want to publicly give vote for this log action?
thanks-confirmation-special-rev: Do you want to publicly give vote for this edit?
flow-thanks-confirmation-special: Do you want to publicly give vote for this comment?
notification-header-flow-vote: $1 {{GENDER:$2|gave vote}} {{GENDER:$5|to you}} for your comment in "$3".
notification-bundle-header-flow-vote: {{PLURAL:$1|One person|$1 people|100=99+ people}} voted {{GENDER:$3|you}} for your comment in "$2".
apihelp-flowvote-description: Send a public vote notification for a Flow comment.
apihelp-flowvote-summary: Send a public vote notification for a Flow comment.
apihelp-flowvote-param-postid: The UUID of the post to vote for.
apihelp-flowvote-example-1: Give Vote for the comment with <kbd>UUID xyz789</kbd>
